links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,3,0,0,-3,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = GCD of n-th and (n+1)st tetrahedral numbers (A000292). - _Ross La Haye_, Sep 13 2003G.f.: (x^8-2x^5+x^4+2x^3+10x^2+2x+1)/(1-x^3)^3.a(n) = A234041(n+1) = A107711(n+4,3) = C(n+3,2)*gcd(n+4,3)/3 for n >= 0. See the o.g.f. of A234041. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Feb 26 2014
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x^8 - 2 x^5 + x^4 + 2 x^3 + 10 x^2 + 2 x + 1)/(1 - x^3)^3, {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 04 2014 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
